about_the_game:
In beyond.frontiers, you take on the role of an intrepid explorer, free to venture through the universe and beyond the known boundaries of three empires.
Discover new systems, encounter friends and foes, and engage in thrilling battlefield. With a large, freely moddable universe and several storylines, this game promises an unforgettable adventure where every decision might shape the fate of the galaxy.


beyond.frontiers comes with an expansive list of cool features, like:
  • Full Moddability
  • Over 20 space ships of varying sizes
  • Multiverse Chat and Events
  • an open, changable universe with over 100 sectors, hidden connections and more
  • fully voiced NPCs and several fully voice acted campaigns
  • easter eggs and hidden things galore
  • completely dynamic trade system based on supply and demand
  • station building
and much much more.


Fly through the frontier regions in a vast array of cool ships, from the allrounder class "Starlight" to heavy cargo ships like the "Demeter". Pilot massive battleships full of defensive turrets, or seek the thrill of the unkown in exploration built crafts. Shield your ship from Radiation, go harvest the most rare materials to sell or salvage the battlefields. Its your choice.


Be part of one of the three main factions ruling over a vast part of the known frontiers.


Join the hypercapitalistic Terrans, where your income counts as everything. Their loyalty lies directly where your credits are, amass riches in the biggest empire of the region through trade or defend the border from pirates.

Enlist with the liberal-democratic Sirians, where freedom counts over everything. Make friends along the way who'd stick with you through everything - if you can manage their borders into pirate territory and forgotten routes.

Or join the meritocratic Orionics, a long lost terran colony, now independent. Here, your wit, your knowledge and your thirst for progress counts more than anything.


With over 20 hours of fully voiced story content over several campaigns, beyond.frontiers will also take you on a journey with old friends and new foes alike. Follow the footsteps of James P. Burnard (spoken by twitch streamer Pelikano), the immortal Wanderer; lead your faction to expansion; bring a forbidden love to fruition; or discover a stellar remnant humanity hasnt seen in a hundred years, its all up to you.

Additionally, each station can offer smaller, dynamically generated missions, from mining, fighting or even defending objects, ships, resources and more. They're cleverly mixed with rumors, which also can open up some events in systems.

Join a universe with a long, exhaustive backstory and many vivid characters roaming around, we are excited to see you in the frontier regions...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6650 or newer
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA3100 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 22H1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2nd Gen or newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: beyond.frontiers is a vast space exploration game. Pilot over 20 ships across 125+ handcrafted and procedural sectors. Customize the game with extensive modding, and dive into fully voiced storylines. Explore, trade, or fight—endless adventures await in the expansive universe of Beyond.Frontiers.
